span.span: from Oklahoma State Department of Education
Click the link for a snapshot of learning for grades PreK - 6th, plus some at home learning activities for your students.
span.a: Oklahoma State Department of Education Family Guides

p.span:
Bowlegs School will begin offering meals to children ages 1-18 years of age on Monday, March 23. Meals for the week will be offered on Mondays from 10:00 to 12:00.
Meals will be delivered to your vehicle on the north side of the cafeteria. (We ask that you please stay in your vehicle.)
To sign up for meals please contact any of the following via email:
Rick Sullinger at rsullinger@bowlegs.k12.ok.us
Jason Lee at jlee@bowlegs.k12.ok.us
Keri Eaton at keaton@bowlegs.k12.ok.us
